11.title: The entrance exam (the duel)

111.content:
"Crap, crap, crap!" You mutter to yourself as you kick off the ground trying to get your skateboard to go faster. "Damn it why did it have to be today of all days that my 2009 Harley Sportster had to break down. Now I'm nearly a half an hour late!" you exclaim as you weave through the crowd towards the Domino City dueling arena. Dodging a hotdog vendor, you see that you are on a collision course with a woman pushing a stroller. Not wanting to run into the stroller you force your board to the right and off of the path, causing you to wipe out. "Man that was close." you say as you pick yourself off of the ground, only to notice that your deck holder had been knocked off. "Why did this have to happen now?" You ask to no one in particular as you scramble to find your deck. After several minutes of searching and having no luck, you contemplate on giving up and heading home, only to hear a voice behind him. "Young man, is this yours?" Turning around you see a white haired man with a red suite on holding your red and black deck box. "Yes thanks I wouldn't be able to take my rating test without it, which reminds me. I"M LATE!! THANKS MAN!" You yell as you take off running towards the arena, leaving a trail of dust and a chuckling man behind.

Inside the Domino City arena a large amount of duels were just finishing up, "Congrats number 2001 on winning your duel and let me be the first to welcome you to the Obelisk Blue Dorms, Miss Julie ." a teenager in a blue trench coat said to a girl who was about 5'8, with dirty blonde hair, and a body any women would kill for. Julie just bowed respectfully to her proctor before heading back to the stands to continue to watch the other duels in progress. 'Where the hell are you (Insert your name)?' Julie wondered as she sat down, her duel didn't take very long thanks to her fairy deck. As the proctor reached the three thousands. "Hey Julie I didn't miss my match did I?" You ask your best friend as you sit behind her, causing her to jump in surprise. "No but you were cutting it a little close don't you think?" she said, while looking around to make sure no one else noticed your late arrival, seeing that no one did she turned back to you, missing the glare that a certain professor sent you. 'Slacker' the man thought when he noticed your late arrival.
"Well sorry, I was up most of the night getting my deck ready, and then my Sportster broke down so I had to ride my board here." You say as you notice the look that she was giving you. "What?" you ask.
"You better be serious, cause last time you said that you didn't change a thing except add a single card." She said
"A, well it was still enough to beat your fairy deck." You said with a smirk. Before she could come up with a come back the loud speaker boomed, "Would number 3369 please report to the dueling field for your exam."
"Well, wish me luck." You say as you walk down the stairs.
Back at the proctors table one of the Obelisk's was about to get up only to be forced down by the professor beside him. "I got this one." The professor said with an air of arrogance and a feminine sounding voice, as he slid a deck from his pocket into his custom duel disk. "Uhm, Professor Crowler aren't you going to use a test deck?" one of the Student proctors asked.
"No this boy shows the same amount of confidence as Jaden did, though his test score were on par with one Atticus Rhodes. So if I don't take him seriously from the beginning, I won't know what his true skill level is." Professor Crowler said as he walked onto the field. As you waited for your opponent to arrive you began to mentally go over your deck, a very powerful Dragon beat down type which contained:

Monsters:
3x. Blue eyes white dragons
3x. Lord of D.
3x. Prime material dragon
3x. Masked dragon
1x Horus the black flame dragon lvl4
1x Horus the black flame dragon lvl6
1x Horus the black flame dragon lvl8
3x White Stone of Legend
2x Kaibaman
3x Red eyes black chick
3x Red eyes black dragon
1x Red eyes darkness metal dragon
2x Kaiser Sea Horse
1x King of the swamp
3x Armed Dragon lvl3
2x Armed dragon lvl5
2x Armed Dragon lvl7
1x Chaos Sorcerer
1x magna dragon
1x Tyrant Dragon
1x Van'Dalygon The Dark Dragon Lord
1x Montage Dragon

Spells:
2x Flute of Summoning Dragon
1x Giant Trunade
1x Fairy Mallet
2x Polymerization
1x Reasoning
2x Lvl up
1x Noble men of crossout
1x stamping Destruction
1x Monster Gate

Traps:
1x Bottomless Trap Hole
1x Mirror Force
1x Sakuretsu Armor
1x Seven tools of the bandit

Breaking out of your mussing you notice an oddly dressed person walking towards you. "So your my opponent." You say with a grin.
"Of course Mr. (insert last name), you di quite well on the written test, now lets see how good you are in the practical." Crowler says with a grin.
"Sure, but I have one question are you a man or a vey ugly women?" you say, causing everyone who heard you to face fault.
"I'm am man, you stupid slacker." Crowler yelled.
"Could have fooled me, ya creepy cross dresser." You say with a twitching eyebrow at the slacker comment, since you worked hard for your skill.
"We will settle who goes first with a coin toss, if that's fine by you?" Crowler asked.
"sure." You answer as he pulls out a quarter and flipped it.
"Tails." You say since you are a firm believer in the saying tails never fails. As the coin lands you see that it landed on tails meaning you could chose first or second. "Well I might as well get this show started." You say as you drew your five cards before drawing your sixth Looking at your hand you see:

During your end phase if this card destroyed a monster as a result of battle you may send this card to the graveyard to special summon Horus lv6.)

1112.title: Hand B

112.content:
"I hope you know we don't tolerate lateness at duel academy," Crowler preached.
"So I was like 3 minutes late, surely you can let that slide." I said.
"NO, now lets start this duel." he said.
He drew five cards, "I'll go first."
"I activate gear town," He said opening the field spell zone and playing this card.
The surroundings changed into a gear like mechanized town.
"With this card....." he started
".......we can summon ancient gear monsters from our hands with one less tribute and if it destroyed and sent to the grave yard, you can special summon one ancient gear monster from you hand, deck or graveyard. Shame that doesn't leave you with much because the better ancient gears can't be special summoned, like your golem and beast."
"Don't interrupt!" he scolded me, "I summon ancient gear beast."
He placed a card on his duel disk and a mechanical canine appeared, "I set a card and end my turn."
A card appeared in front of him, and his ended his turn.
"My turn," I drew.
"Active the field spell mountain," the building crumbled and mountains rose up from the ground.
"Go ahead," He said, "I get a ancient gear, and I choose ancient gear knight."
"Great, I have a knight in rusty armor to contend with," I said sarcastically, "I summon axes dragonute."
A biped dragon formed in front of me with a axe to hand.
"I activate the spell double summon, so I can special summon again, I choose Hunter dragon.
Another dragon appeared in front of me.
"First Hunter dragon attack the ancient gear knight," I declared and the first one went fourth.
"Your dragon it weaker than my knight," Crowler shook his head.
"Why do you think mountain is up, it gives my dragon another 200 atk points,"I said.
"Wait!" he shouted, but hunter dragon had already headbutted the knight and it blew up, shrapnel hit Crowler (4000-3900)
"You'll pay for that." he growled.
"Not yet, Axes dragonute attack." the two legged dragon swung it's axe at the beast.
It blew up too and hit crowler with more shrapnel (3900-3700).
"I activate my face down, Damage condenser, with this...."
".......you can summon a monster when you take battle damage whose atk is equal or less to the damage you just took."
"STOP DOING THAT," he scolded me even louder. The audience laughed.
"I summon ancient gear."
"It's always a shame when the mighty fall, good think it was you and not me then," me and the audience laughed.
The axe dragonute sit down in defense "I set two cards and end my turn,"
Crowlers face was red with anger and fury.
"My turn," He roared while drawing.
"I activate my trap card, Thunder of ruler, now you can't conduct your battle phase."
"I special summon ancient gear by it's effect and now I tribute the two ancient gears and summon ancient gear golem, now who is mighty."
"Me. I activate trap hole, when you normal or flip summon a monster with 1000 or more attack points it is destroyed."
"WHAT??!" he said as a hole opened beneath his behemoth and it fell and closed up.
"I...end...my....turn," he said weakly.
"My turn I draw. and I activate pot of greed and draw to more cards."
"I activate ancient runes, so I can summon a level 5 or above monster with out sacrifices, so I summon Soul capture dragon."
A large dragon comes out.
"Attack." All three attack, hunter dragon head butts him while axes dragonute chops him, soul capture drago blasts him.
Crowler (3700-0)
"I win, miss crowler." I said.
He fell to the ground. "humiliated again, he has to be punished but I can't put him in slifer, wait did he call me miss, I know I put him in the girls dorm, he want last a weak.
112.title: First turn.

114.content:
"Attack Ancient gear golem!" Crowler roared to his giant beast.
"Your pitiful cave dragon is destroyed and you lose 1000 life points leaving you with 100LP. Lets face it, you have lost," Crowler boasted "This will teach you for being late."
"You're beginning to bore me Crowler so I will finish this," I said, "My turn draw,"
"Perfect," I say in a sly tone.
"You have no monsters on your field, no spell or traps either" He said confused.
"First I play Cost down I discard a card and all the monsters in my hand are reduced by two levels,"
"Then I play monster reborn and resurrect relentless dragon, which I just discarded."
"I sacrifice relentless dragon and summon my favorite." I say holding it in, but I let it go on "Soul capture dragon!"
"It now gains The ability of relentless dragon so it can attack twice."
"What is the use? my golem is stronger." Crowler gloated.
"You remeber the first monster you destroyed."
"That pitiful level one with no attack or defense."
"Now it is coming back," I smirk. "By removing Gravial Dragon alliance from play I can give on dragon monster 100 Atk for every other dragon in my grave, Giving my dragon and extra 1000 more attacks points."
Dragonoid spirits rise from the graveyard and spin around Soul capture dragon before been absorbed by it."
"Now Attack ancient gear golem," I roared.
It opened it's mouth and roared a white beam destroying Ancient gear golem.
Crowler LP 1000-200.
"Now my beast can attack your Ancient gear solider,"
"But it's in defense mode. I won't take any damage."
"My dragon gains your Golems abilities," I grinned.
"What!? Wait a minute," he pleaded. but Soul capture dragon had all ready attacked and ended the duel.
"I'm in," I said soaking in the applaud from all the others

1142.content:
I walked out to the airport behind the entrance exams.
I was stoked, I'm going to duel academy like I always wanted.
I took a seat towards the front.
"STARDUST!" A loud voice said behind me, I knew who it was.
A girl around my age and a long time friend came up, quickly, and hugged my breathless.
"Hi, Julie," I said speechless.
"That was a great duel," She said sparing me by letting go.
1142.title: On the plane.

choices: Put it on, and have Julie help you
13.content:
The plane had just landed, and me Julie had departed.
"Hey Froslad, lets head over to our dorm." Julie came out with randomly, "We can get moved in, and all academy provided items are already in the room."
I smiled, pulled out that device, a duel device, I was given, "Okay," I agreed, and looked up, "According to this, I'm in that dorm over there."
Julie looked confused for a second after following my finger, which was pointing to a nearby dorm, "You too, I'm in that dorm. Room J5."
I scrolled though I lodging details, "Me two," I said smiling excitedly, and she had a wider smile than Cheshire Cat and though and arm around my neck, and dragged me. We got into the dorm, seeing the stairs, "Race you to our room," and she was off.
"I excitable," I sighed with a brief laugh, and followed behind her.

Room J5 was on the right side of the fifth floor. The door was ajar, so I pressed it open. Inside was a large luxurious room, with two big beds, equally big wardrobe (from this perspective), two computers, two bathroom, each looking fully stocked, other various things like furniture and cupboards, and a Julie. She had already gotten changed, she was now posing in front of a mirrior, in the obelisk blue uniform. "I've got to say, that suites you."
She turned around, "You mean that?" she asked feeling flattered. "Yes, you do look cute in it."
She looked extremely happy, "Come on Froslad, lets see you in your," she said jumping in joy, and pointing a box on your bed.
A faint smile formed, but it was not to last, I opened the box, I was shock stiff, embarrassed and unable to move. Julie laughed.
"What am I going to do!?" You ask offended and confused.
"Put it on," she stopped laughing to say, before breaking out into laughing again.

14132111211121211.content:
"Hello, Julie and Hamn8r," you heard Alexa say.

You both turned around to see Alexa with two girls that looked like her sister's best friends, only shorter and cuter.

"Hey, Alexa," you said. "I assume those two are the little sisters of your sister's best friends?"

"Yes. This is Maria and Jessica," she said gesturing to the two girls. "Now, might I ask what you're doing over here?"

"Uh, um, uh--"

"Can't you tell, Lexi?" Julie said.

"Lexi? That was my sister's nickname by that pompous rich boy, Chazz Princeton."

"I know. My cousin Jesse told me."

"Jesse Anderson is your cousin?"

"Duh, why do--"

"Girls, could you stop?" you said, all eyes turning to you. "Look, Julie, let's just go. If we don't, I'm gonna snap and do something I may regret."

(3400-3000)

I tribute one dragon monster on my field, I destroy all face down monster, face up monster with less defense than the dragon I used as the tribute's attack and all spells and traps. info.brief_description: You are in the Yugioh universe going into duel academy with some strange events
info.description:
After Alexis, Jaden and the others leave duel academy, you enter.
You are a great duelist and are instantly in the Obelisk dorm.
But for some reason you are put in the girls dorm.
You are put in a room with your childhood friend Julie Anderson (who is Jesse's little cousin) (who is just as good a duelist as you).
This is about your days as an obelisk girl while you maintain your male body.
Rules.
The main character has a dragon deck. His ace cards is the soul capture dragon. (Atk. 2800 def. 2500 Lv.8 Ability: This card gains the abilities of one of the tributed Monsters. When this card destroyed a monster by battle this card gain that monsters ability(s) No more than five abilities on this card form it's second ability.)
Julie has a fairy deck.
Use your own handle as a name.
keep all options open.
info.pretty_title: A boy in the girls dorm.
